src:
田中圭遭副機長捧臉強吻　微露蜜桃臀讓網友大喊：想咬一口！
04 Nov 2019, 00:14 by 蔡世偉
friDay影音同步日本跟播《大叔的愛》第二季《大叔的愛~in the sky~》，該劇首集播出狂登推特熱搜冠軍，其中男主角田中圭上演被霸道副機長千葉雄大捧臉強吻，還被誤認為情敵，慘被潑了兩次咖啡，以及被搧了兩次耳光，劇情神展開放大絕，迅速獲得網友熱烈迴響。
田中圭劇裡角色設定言延續上一季的「廢材設定」，感情上再次面臨「左右為難」，身邊的長官、同事、室友都暗戀他，網友直呼，第一季掰彎了房地產公司，這一季要來掰彎航空公司了，又說如果還有第三季，田中圭是不是可以親遍日本所有鮮肉！
《大叔的愛》第二季《大叔的愛~in the sky~》首播登推特熱搜冠軍，網友看得甜喊「幸福到冒泡」，首集開場田中圭躺在床上穿西裝褲模樣，四角褲下掩蓋不住他「蜜桃臀」，網友羞喊想咬一口，更直喊想幫他穿褲。


《大叔的愛》第二季開播，這次田中圭「扳彎」航空公司。（friDay影音提供）

《大叔的愛》第二季亮點除田中圭與吉田鋼太郎兩人之間的感情糾葛外，本季加入的千葉雄大與戶次重幸，也被網友推測將加入爭奪戰，上演四角情節，而千葉雄大戲外透露此次角色特性是和誰都能接吻的角色，更讓人覺得曖昧。
而吉田鋼太郎在首集中一直在暗地裡觀愛田中圭，透過監視器看到田中圭被千葉雄大強吻，自己簡直不敢相信，戲外則透露將比第一季更深愛「春田田」。戶次重幸則被發現暗自偷畫田中圭的「出浴圖」，田中圭精實六塊肌意外透過畫像展現。
更新時間｜2019.11.04 00:12
text:
Tian Zhonggui was kissed by the vice captain and kissed. The little peaches and hips let the netizens shout: I want to take a bite!
04 Nov 2019, 00:14 by Cai Shiwei
friDay video synchronization Japan broadcasts "Uncle's Love" the second season "Uncle's love ~ in the sky~", the first episode of the show broadcasts a mad tweet hot search champion, in which the male lead Tian Zhonggui staged overbearing deputy captain Chiba Xiongda held a strong kiss and was mistaken for the enemy. He was twice splashed with coffee and was slap in the face twice. The story was amplified and quickly received a warm response from netizens.
In the Tian Zhonggui drama, the character setting continued the "waste material setting" of the previous season, and the feelings once again faced "difficulty." The chiefs, colleagues, and roommates around him secretly loved him. The netizens shouted, and the first quarter smashed the real estate company. This season is going to bend the airline, and if there is still the third season, can Tian Zhonggui be able to kiss all the fresh meat in Japan!
The second season of "Uncle's Love" "Uncle's Love ~in the sky~" premiered the hot search champion, netizens saw sweet shouting "happiness to bubbling", the first episode opened Tian Zhonggui lying on the bed wearing a suit pants Under the four-cornered trousers, he couldn’t cover his "peach and hip". The netizen shy and wanted to take a bite, and even shouted to help him wear pants.


"Uncle's Love" was launched in the second quarter, and this time Tian Zhonggui "pushed" the airline. (provided by friDay)

In the second season of "Uncle's Love", in addition to the emotional entanglement between Tian Zhonggui and Yoshida Kentaro, the Chiba Yuda and the households who joined this season are fortunate, and they are also speculated that they will join the battle and stage the four corners. Outside Chiba’s drama, the character of the character is a role that can be kissed by anyone, and it is even more embarrassing.
In the first episode, Yoshida Kentaro has been secretly watching Ai Tianzhong, and through the monitor, Tian Zhonggui was kissed by Chiba, and he couldn’t believe it. Outside the show, he revealed that he would love Chuntiantian more than the first season. When the family was lucky, it was discovered that he secretly stole the "bathing map" of Tian Zhonggui. Tian Zhonggui's six-piece muscle accident was revealed through the portrait.
Update time|2019.11.04 00:12
